Package splitter

Class FileSplitterCompress

  • java.lang.Object
    • splitter.FileSplitter
      • splitter.FileSplitterCompress
  • public class FileSplitterCompress
extends FileSplitter
    Gestisce la compressione e decompressione dei file divisi. Estende FileSplitter.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gabriele Mattioli
